Reference

Launch the application from R

cdwtools()

Run the Shiny Application

Manipulate data inside the App

Use these functions from inside the App in developper mode.

import_datamart()

Import a datamart

import_thesaurus()

Import a thesaurus

run_datamart_code()

Run datamart code

add_patients_to_subset()

Add patients to a subset

update_r()

Update r variable

Utils functions

Use these functions from inside the App in developper mode.

translate()

Translate a word

convert_tibble_to_list()

Convert a tibble to list

coalesce2()

Coalesce

App database functions

Use these functions from inside the App indevelopper mode.

get_local_db()

Connection to local database

get_distant_db()

Connection to distant database

test_distant_db()

Test connection to distant database

get_db()

Get database DBI object

db_create_table()

Create a new table

db_create_tables()

Create tables

insert_default_values()

Insert default values in database

Layout functions

Use these functions from inside the App in developper mode.

make_layout()

Make a complete layout with header, sidenav, main & footer

make_page()

Make a page

make_card()

Make a shiny.fluent card

make_dropdown()

Make a shiny.fluent dropdown

make_textfield()

Make a shiny.fluent textfield

make_people_picker()

Make a shiny.fluent people picker

make_toggle()

Make a shiny.fluent toggle

show_message_bar()

Display an error message

Internal functions

Functions used to create Shiny UI & Server code

render_settings_default_elements()

Render UI of settings default elements

render_settings_toggle_card()

Render UI of settings toggle card

render_settings_creation_card()

Render UI of settings creation card

render_settings_datatable_card()

Render UI of settings datatable card

render_settings_options_card()

Render UI of options card

render_settings_code_card()

Render UI of edit_code card

render_settings_datatable()

Render management datatable

render_settings_delete_react()

Render delete react

add_settings_new_data()

Add new settings data

update_settings_datatable()

Update datatable

save_settings_datatable_updates()

Save changes in datatable

delete_settings_datatable_row()

Delete a row in datatable

save_settings_options()

Save options

save_settings_code()

Save code edition

execute_settings_code()

Execute / test code after edition

create_datatable_cache()

Create cache for datatable data
